Title: Limits the state tax on motor and Diesel fuels to the national average; repealer
Summary: Limits the state tax on motor and diesel fuels to the national average.
LawCode: Amd §§284, 282-a, 289-e & 289-c, rpld §§282-b, 282-c, 284-a & 284-c, Tax L; amd §376, Pub Auth L; amd §10-c, Hway L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, the public authorities law and the highway law, in relation to limiting the tax on motor fuels to the national average; and to repeal sections 282-b, 282-c, 284-a and 284-c of the tax law relating to additional and supplemental fuel taxes
